name: FC Porto dash menu - Tumblr
description: FC Porto tumblr dash menu, created by Dan (http://juanmoutinho.tumblr.com). Image Â© : http://euteamoporto.blogspot.fr/2012_07_01_archive.html .
additional_info:
HOW TO UNINSTALL:

- FIREFOX USERS:
1. On the menu on top, click 'Tools' then 'Add-ons'. 
2. A box will open up, click 'User Styles'. 
3. Click on the name of the Style then click 'Uninstall' or 'Disable' if you still want to keep it but doesn't want to use it for now. 

- CHROME USERS:
1. On the menu on top click 'Tools' then 'Extensions'. 
2. A new window will show up, look for 'Stylish' then click 'Options'. 
3. Another new window will show up, click 'Delete' or 'Disable' if you still want to keep it but doesn't want to use it for now, then 'Ok'.
